attributes.action: Extend driving theory tests For those  Who have been affected by lockdown
attributes.additional_details: The two years given to pass is there to relieve stress and allow time to pass a physical driving test. I believe because of a lockdown it has increased the stress rate and we have missed months of lesson time ,which gives us little time to pass due to no fault of our own. can we consider this and extend the time to ease not only the pressure of the learners but also the driving instructors, and to claim the time back that we have been deprived of . Please help us!!
attributes.background: I would like the government to Extend the time for those who have passed their theory tests but due to a lockdown was unable to undergo driving lessons in order to pass their practical driving tests.
